exude.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if you exude a particular quality, it is easy to see that you have a lot of it
exude.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He exuded an air of wealth and power.
exude.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to flow out slowly and steadily, or to make something do this
exude.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The plant exudes a sticky liquid.
